decors.title: Three Velvet Bell Garlands
decors.notes: Adorn your tree, staircase or mantelpiece in truly traditional Christmas style with our set of Three Velvet Bell Garlands. Each with ten red bows and golden bells, if these don’t get you thinking about magical sleighs, we don’t know what will.

decors.title: Twelve Light Up Baubles
decors.notes: A fabulous way to decorate your tree, our set of twelve light up baubles feature four different designs on a frosted white background - simply switch on to bring the designs to life. Each bauble is finished with a silver top and white organza loop for hanging.

decors.title: Fabulously Full Fir Tree у edited
decors.notes: With a classically festive shape and rich green foliage, our Fabulously Full Fir Tree will give your home all the charm and joy of a real tree, without the added stress of falling needles and the need to water. Split into three easy to assemble sections, our tree has hinged, posable branches that will simply fall into place, ready for you to bend them into whatever arrangement you prefer. Decorate, then stand back to appreciate an end result that is practically indistinguishable from the real thing.

decors.title: Super Bright Super Long String Lights
decors.notes: Set your imagination free and transform your home into a magical wonderland populated by hundreds of tiny fairies with our Super Bright Super Long String Lights. Set the 960 warm white LED bulbs to a steady glow or twinkle effect and let the festivities begin.

decors.title: Biodegradable Snow
decors.notes: Dress your windowsills, create tiny festive scenes and even give your garden a little sprinkling with our Biodegradable Snow. Made from corn starch, this snow is environmentally friendly - simple use as you wish, then add to your food waste or compost bin.

decors.title: Snowy Village Musical Snowglobe
decors.notes: Ideal to give to a loved one as a traditional Christmas gift or to display on a mantelpiece for a touch of classic festive fun, our Snowy Village Musical Snowglobe is adorned inside and out with snow-topped houses, frosted trees and tiny figures making merry. Wind up to hear a twinkling rendition of 'We Wish You a Merry Christmas' or simply give it a little shake and enjoy the gentle snow fall.

decors.title: Fabulous Pre-Lit Pine Tree
decors.notes: Positioned inside or out, our impressive pre-lit trees will create quite the festive-fabulous impression year after year. Select from a 7ft, 8 ft or 10ft tree, each has a statuesque silhouette that is pre-lit at perfectly placed intervals with warm white lights on a discreet green wire, the absolute centrepiece to your Christmas home - positioned outside as your return home and guest arrive, or standing majestically in your hall or living room. Specifically designed for optional use outside, our trees are effortless to assemble, the three sections of the each Indoor Outdoor Fabulous Pre-Lit Pine Tree are already shaped and posed for you, so all you need to do is join together and connect; the hinged branches simply fall perfectly into place.

decors.title: Black Metal Cone Tree
decors.notes: An ideal choice for those who are a little short on space, or for those who would like a toned-down, minimalist Christmas, our Black Metal Cone Tree has a simple, elegant silhouette and can be dressed up as much or as little as suits your holiday mood. Try winding it around with fairy lights, or solely hanging it with a selection of coordinating baubles

decors.title: Frosted Pine Potted Tree
decors.notes: Standing at a compact two and a half feet tall with a full, bushy appearance and lovely snowy finish, our sweet little Frosted Pine Potted Tree is perfect for placing in a hallway, child’s bedroom or as the main event if you’re short on space or planning a small Christmas. Extremely realistic yet wonderfully whimsical, dress our tree with baubles, garlands, lights, and even a decorative outer pot to complete the look.

decors.title: Light Up Crown Tree Topper
decors.notes: Add a regal touch to your festive decorating this year and really let Christmas rule your home with our Light Up Crown Tree Topper. Simply place over the upper-most branches of your tree, straight or at a jaunty angle, for a grand look with a little bit of playful charm.

decors.title: Three Gilded Shells - Slim
decors.notes: The ideal festive decorations for those who love the ocean and all its wonderful inhabitants, our set of Three Gilded Shells will add both nautical charm and a glamorous yet whimsical touch to your scheme this year.

decors.title: Light Up Moon Bauble edited2
decors.notes: Create a magical atmosphere in your home this Christmas with our ethereal Light Up Moon Bauble. Battery powered for easy transportation, hang anywhere from your tree to your mantelpiece and enjoy its gentle warm white glow.

decors.title: Nutcracker Tree Train
decors.notes:
A charming finishing touch to your Christmas tree, our happy holiday steam train decoration runs around a little red track at the base of your tree, and features two nutcracker characters working the engine as the train shunters by.

Perfect for evoking memories of Christmas gone by, this moving train features a realistic train track sound accompanied by a jolly jingle bells tune.

decors.title: Twenty Four Hanging Metal Stars
decors.notes: Opt for a decorative scheme with a soft spot for cool, industrial design this winter and display our Twenty Four Hanging Metal Stars on your tree and around your home for a bold festive look.

decors.title: Six Dried Grasses Glass Baubles edit
decors.notes:
Embrace fresh, clean design this winter and create a decorative scheme that is undeniably festive, but simultaneously promotes tranquility and mindfulness through the use of natural materials and neutral colours.

Our set of Six Dried Grasses Glass Baubles will help you do just this and are beautiful additions to any tree, mantelpiece or staircase.

decors.title: Pre-Lit Potted Tree
decors.notes:
To add a festive touch anywhere in the home - our battery-powered Mini Pre-Lit Pine Tree, although perfectly petite, is very nearly indistinguishable from the real thing by its slender branches and delicate little integrated lights.

The little tree stands on a round wooden stand that hides the battery compartment. Try creating a magical display with more than one teamed together.

decors.title: Four Paper Trees
decors.notes:
Embrace fresh, clean design this winter and create a decorative scheme that is undeniably festive, but simultaneously promotes simplicity and mindfulness through the use of limited materials and colours.

Our set of Four Paper Trees will help you do just this and are beautiful additions to any tree, mantelpiece or staircase.

decors.title: Four Glittered Bows - Red
decors.notes: With all the delicate charm and movement of fabric bows, but crafted from solid material that will not lose its bounce, our set of Four Glittered Bows will keep your home looking festive throughout the whole season.

decors.title: Fabulous Front Door Light Up Tree Set
decors.notes: Transform the entrance to your home into a gateway through to Santas Grotto with our four piece Fabulous Front Door Light Up Tree Set. Weather proof and battery powered for easy transportation and installation, this set will brighten the day of anyone who has the good fortune to walk through a doorway adorned in it.

decors.title: Outdoor Twinkle Lights
decors.notes:
Transform your outdoor space into a magical winter wonderland with our simple and striking twinkle lights. Display round your porch, in a garden tree or around your bannister.

Suitable for both indoor and outdoor use, our set of 750 warm white LED lights are scattered along a green cable and include an eight function controller that lets the lights twinkle, fade, flash or stay static.

decors.title: Four Blue Reactive Glaze Glass Baubles
decors.notes: Finished with an effect reminiscent of coral or creatures found deep in the ocean, our set of Four Blue Reactive Glaze Glass Baubles are the ideal festive decorations for those who love the sea and all its wonderful inhabitants.
